translation.en: Shit.
Hello? Hello?
Hey, guys. It's not funny.

Hello? Who's there?
[with Russian accent] Happy birthday, George.
Are you coming?

translation.en: The kind that will bring all the girls to your yard.

Uh, I understand,

translation.en: It's basically a liquid metal similar to mercury.

translation.en: Except it won't poison you or make you want to eat your own face.

translation.en: And that makes it valuable.
Only problem is, we can't keep up with demand.

translation.en: Which hasn't always been the case. Believe me.

translation.en: What?
-Yeah! Hustle, hustle, hustle. -Okay.

Excuse me, please. Um…

translation.en: Like the rest of my life in which I'm permanently broke,

We really shouldn't.
I suppose he didn't say we couldn't look.

Exactly.

translation.en: -I don't want to hear it. -Right.

Put on a jacket. It looks like you slept in that shirt.

Geologists.

you will no longer be getting your annual bonus.
translation.zh: 你们不会再有年度奖金

translation.en: -What? -[all grumbling]
Shh. No. Hold on. Let me finish.
translation.zh: 不 等一下 让我说完

translation.en: It's not all bad news.
Instead of… money,
which, let's be frank, most of you would just tk-tk-tk away anyway,
translation.zh: 坦白说 这个钱反正也会被你们大部分人拿去买酒花光

translation.en: the company has decided to give you
this amazing company-branded clothing.
translation.zh: 一件漂亮的有公司标志的衣服

translation.en: I mean, take a look at this!
The survey also indicates
that your colleagues don't like the way you treat them.
translation.zh: 你们的同事不喜欢你们对待他们的方式

translation.en: They say you are, open quote, "sub-human", close quotes.
I know why. Because you spend all day on spreadsheets.
translation.zh: 我知道为什么因为你们整天都在忙活电子表格

translation.en: Maybe all night.
Who can tell me, what is the most important thing in any business?
translation.zh: 谁能告诉我一个企业最重要的是什么？

translation.en: Yes.
Sharp pencils.
Do you use sharp pencils in your everyday job?
translation.zh: 你每天的日常工作中都会用削尖的铅笔吗？

translation.en: No.
Then why would you think they're most important?
translation.zh: 那你为什么会觉得它们最重要？

translation.en: Because the Russians use them in space.
translation.zh: 因为俄罗斯人在太空中使用它们

translation.en: Are you in space right now?
Yes. The work space.
Anyone else?
Anyone else?
Anyone else, please? Anyone else, please?
Yes.
-What about pens? -Damn it!
Customers!
The customer is the lifeblood of any company. Okay?
translation.zh: 客户是任何一家公司的命脉 好吧？

translation.en: You don't know that because you don't get to see the customer.
translation.zh: 你们不知道是因为你们见不到客户

translation.en: We are changing that today.
translation.zh: 我们今天要改变这一点

translation.en: You will all have your own personalized customer
translation.zh: 你们都会有属于自己的定制客户

translation.en: that you will take with you everywhere you go.
You will take your customer to the kitchen.
You will take your customer to the toilet.
You will take your customer with you. Are we clear?
translation.zh: 你们要一直把客户带在身上清楚了吗？

translation.en: Uh, sorry. Uh, Carol. I am not taking a sex toy to the toilet.
translation.zh: 抱歉 卡罗尔 我不会带性玩具上厕所

translation.en: It is not a sex toy! It is a customer.
translation.zh: 这不是性玩具！这是客户

translation.en: You will take the customer with you to the toilet. Every time!
translation.zh: 你要带客户去厕所 每次都是！

translation.en: -Do you understand? -Yes, yes. Okay, I understand.
Wow!
[Carol] And, unfortunately, we do not have pumps.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是 我们没有打气筒

translation.en: So you're going to have to blow your customer yourself.
translation.zh: 所以你们要自己给客户吹气

translation.en: Just be careful where you put your mouth. It can be very confusing.
translation.zh: 只是要注意你嘴巴的位置不然会让人很困惑

translation.en: [Prince] You know what I don't get?
translation.zh: （客户） 你知道我不明白什么吗？

translation.en: Why'd he leave Melusi in charge?
translation.zh: 他为什么要让梅鲁西掌权？

translation.en: Come on, dude. It's his son. What else was he supposed to do?
translation.zh: 拜托 老兄 那是他儿子他还能怎样？

translation.en: He could've given it to Sam.
translation.zh: 他可以把公司交给萨姆

translation.en: Shit, I'd even do a better job.
translation.zh: 该死 连我都能做得更好

translation.en: You're a junior accountant carrying a sex doll around.
translation.zh: 你是个扛着性爱娃娃到处走的初级会计

translation.en: -I don't think you've got what it takes. -You think you do?
translation.zh: -我不觉得你能管理好公司-你以为你能行吗？

translation.en: -You don't even balls to ask Portia out. -Whoa.
translation.zh: 你都没胆子约波西娅出去

translation.en: -I think I know what he's doing. -Who?
Melusi. He's cutting costs.
translation.zh: 梅鲁西 他在降低成本

translation.en: Trying to make it look like AMI is more profitable than what it is.
translation.zh: 试着让AMI看起来比实际盈利更多

translation.en: Why would he do that?
To jack up the price. Right?
You think he wants to sell the company?
translation.zh: 你觉得他想卖掉公司吗？

translation.en: There's only one way to find out.
translation.zh: 要查清真相只有一个办法

translation.en: I'll ask him.
-Ask him? -Yeah.
You do realize he hates you, right?
Like, on a biblical level.
It doesn't matter.
I just have to figure out what buttons to push.
translation.zh: 我只需要弄清楚该按那个按钮就行了

translation.en: Okay, well, just don't push the button that says,
translation.zh: 好吧 别按那个上面写着

translation.en: "Punch Sam in the Head."
Because you will lose that fight. Badly.
translation.zh: 因为你会输的 输得很惨

translation.en: It'd be like a rhino stomping on a frog.
Except the frog's already, like, diabetic and shit.
translation.zh: 只不过那只青蛙已经得了糖尿病

translation.en: Like, in a wheelchair, and it can't even hop--
translation.zh: 坐着轮椅 甚至都跳不起来…

translation.en: I get it. I get it.
-Oh! Hello, Sam. -Hey, Gugu.
How are you?
Hey, I'm fine. Thank you. Uh, you've got a…
translation.zh: 我很好 谢谢 你那个…

translation.en: -Uh, oh. [sniffs] Oh, thanks! -You got a… Yeah.
It's, uh… medical powder for my allergies.
translation.zh: 这是…我治疗过敏的药粉

translation.en: Yeah, that's not what I was talking about. Uh, never mind.
translation.zh: 我说的不是那个 算了

translation.en: Is he available?
Oh, he's about to pop out.
Pop out? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 出去？ 好吧 那我得抓紧了！抓紧时间！不好意思

translation.en: All right, well I'm just going to grab it. Grab him! Grab him. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我得抓紧了！抓紧时间！不好意思

translation.en: Okay…
Oh jeez. [scoffs]
Hey. Hey!
I need to talk to you.
I didn't realize that you're the one in charge now. Huh?
translation.zh: 我都不知道现在是你管事了

translation.en: So what can I do for you, boss?
translation.zh: 有什么能效劳的 老板？

translation.en: Look, you've been here for what? A couple of months?
translation.zh: 听着 你来公司多久了？几个月？

translation.en: I've been here since day one.
translation.zh: 我从公司成立那天起就在这儿了

translation.en: I just need to know whether you're going to sell the company.
translation.zh: 我只是想知道 你是不是要卖掉公司

translation.en: Who told you that?
You did, actually.
I mean, you've been cutting corners everywhere.
translation.zh: 我是说 你在削减各部门的成本

translation.en: -It's pretty obvious. -[chuckles]
Look at that, huh? Miner boy!
Now you think you understand business.
translation.zh: 你觉得你现在懂生意了

translation.en: If you sell to another mining company our people will lose their jobs.
translation.zh: 如果你卖给另一家采矿公司我们的人会失业

translation.en: -They helped build this place. You can't-- -Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: -他们帮助建设了这个地方 你不能…-嘿！

translation.en: I'm the one who's in charge here.
Me! I'll do whatever I like here.
If you had a little bit more respect for your father
translation.zh: 如果你对你父亲和他打下的江山

translation.en: and what he's done here, you--
My father? My father?
Who are you to talk to me about my father?
translation.zh: 你有什么资格跟我谈我父亲？

translation.en: Get out. Get out!
Nonsense.
-Hey. -Hey.
How bad is it?
Seven. Maybe eight. Not that she'll admit it.
translation.zh: 10分满的话 7 或者8但她不会承认的

translation.en: Are you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm fine.
-Where is she? -In her room.
-All right. -I'll warm your food.
translation.zh: -好吧-我把食物给你加热一下

translation.en: Thank you.
-[knocking] -Hey, Princess.
Dad, I'm 15. You've gotta stop calling me that.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我15岁了 你别再这样叫我了

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry. How're you doing?
Are you… are you in any pain?
As I told Mom, I'm fine. I can barely feel it.
translation.zh: 我已经跟妈妈说了 我没事我几乎感觉不到痛

translation.en: Okay.
Well, uh, do you mind if I take a look?
That's, uh… That's not that bad. Right?
translation.zh: 这…没那么糟糕 对吧？

translation.en: -See? -Yeah.
I mean, the way your mom was going on on the phone,
translation.zh: 按你妈妈在电话里的口气

translation.en: you'd swear it was a seven… or an eight.
translation.zh: 你会觉得肯定得有7…或者8的程度

translation.en: It's nowhere near an eight. It's like a four.
translation.zh: 离8远着呢 也就4的样子

translation.en: Right.
Well, if I knew that, I would've stopped off at the bar,
translation.zh: 如果我早知道的话我会在酒吧门口停下来

translation.en: picked up a couple shotskis.
You? Shots?
Hey. There's a lot about me you don't know. Okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 关于我你不知道的事还多着呢 好吧？

translation.en: I am capable of stuff.
-Really? -Girl…
Want me to call your mom? To…
translation.zh: 你想让我叫你妈妈吗？来帮你…

translation.en: Seriously? I don't need help putting on cream.
translation.zh: 认真的吗？我不需要别人帮忙涂乳霜

translation.en: I'm not a little girl anymore.
Dad?
Mm! Right. Right. I'm cramping your style.
Well, uh… I'll let you get to it, then.
-Hey, Dad? -Yeah? Yeah?
I love you.
I love you too, Princess.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 我的公主

translation.en: How was work?
Started badly. Went downhill from there.
translation.zh: 开了个糟糕的头 然后开始走下坡路

translation.en: You know, pretty standard.
I suppose it's my fault?
What are you talking about?
You've been spoiled your whole life.
Now you can't face having to work for a living.
translation.zh: 现在你无法接受要工作过活的现实

translation.en: It's not working I have a problem with.
It's being an accountant.
You know, I don't get it.
What's so wrong with being a paramedic?
translation.zh: 当医护人员有什么不好？

translation.en: You don't have the stomach to work on the front line.
translation.zh: 你没有胆量做前线工作

translation.en: You're a coward.
Always have been.
I… I was a nervous kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候确实容易紧张

translation.en: Yes, I'll give you that. But…
[clears throat] I'm not that kid anymore.
translation.zh: 但我已经不是你印象中的那个小孩了

translation.en: Yes, you are.
You're weak. Just like your mother.
translation.zh: 你很软弱 跟你妈妈一样

translation.en: You know what?
That's enough, Dad.
Would a coward do this?
Something you want to say to me, boy?
translation.zh: 你有话想对我说吗 孩子？

translation.en: No. No, um…
There's no point.
Good night.
[Junior] Guys, could you take that shit off?
translation.zh: 伙计们 你们能把戏服脱掉吗？

translation.en: [Junior] Okay, look. I don't ask for a lot around here.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 我要求的不多

translation.en: Just please leave my shit alone.
translation.zh: 拜托你们别动我的东西

translation.en: Well, just so you know. We're not proud of what happened.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们并没有对发生的事感到骄傲

translation.en: Won't happen again.
If it makes you feel better, we didn't enjoy the food.
translation.zh: 如果这能让你好受点的话我们并不喜欢你的食物

translation.en: No, not at all.
[man] It was horrible.
Like dog food. If you hated your dog.
translation.zh: 像狗食 你得多恨你的狗才会给它吃那种东西

translation.en: You should totally take some cooking lessons.
Oh, that's a good idea.
Okay. I'm sorry that my cooking isn't up to your standards.
translation.zh: 好吧 很抱歉我的厨艺没达到你们的标准

translation.en: -But you need to make your own food. -[both chuckle]
Ah, if only it were that easy.
translation.zh: 要是真那么简单就好了

translation.en: What do you mean?
We are exceptionally busy during the day.
You're both unemployed.
That is not true.
-And not fair. -And you know it.
translation.zh: -而且不公平-而且你心知肚明

translation.en: I'll have you know that we do a lot around here.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 我们在家里有很多事要忙

translation.en: Like?
Well, for starters, uh, meditating.
Every morning we make sure
translation.zh: 每天早上我们都会确保

translation.en: that there is clean energy in all the rooms.
translation.zh: 所有房间都充满了干净的能量

translation.en: All the rooms.
All the rooms.
[man on recording] Take your next breath,
sending it into your lower back and belly.
Releasing any tension that you may be holding in these areas.
translation.zh: 释放你在这些区域的压力

translation.en: Are you telling me that the two of you have been naked
translation.zh: 你是说你们两个光着身子

translation.en: in my room?
That's not the point. The point is that we do more than our fair share.
translation.zh: 这不是重点 重点是我们为这个家额外付出了很多

translation.en: Way more.
Okay. Um…
Name one other thing.
One actual thing.
translation.zh: 一件你们真正做了的事

translation.en: DIY.
DIY.
When things go wrong around here, who sorts it out?
translation.zh: 家里出问题时 你以为是谁解决的？

translation.en: Not you, that's for sure. You're never here.
translation.zh: 不是你 这是肯定的 你从来都不在家

translation.en: You come and go as you please.
translation.zh: 你想来就来 想走就走

translation.en: That's because I have a job!
Let's watch the tone of voice. Bring it down.
translation.zh: 注意下语气 别那么激动

translation.en: Yeah. Relax.
You know what?
I've literally never seen you guys fix a single thing around here.
translation.zh: 我从没见过你们修好家里的任何一件东西

translation.en: Uh, who do you think fixed the burst pipe in the bathroom this very morning? Hmm?
translation.zh: 你觉得今天早上是谁把浴室爆掉的水管修好了？

translation.en: [exhales] There's a burst pipe in the bathroom?
Mm-hmm.
How did that happen?
No idea.
Megan. Megan!
[Sam] Maybe I'm overreacting.
Maybe with the right buyer, things won't be so bad.
translation.zh: 也许如果有合适的买家事情不会太糟

translation.en: We could increase production, improve R&D,
translation.zh: 我们可以增加产量 改进研发

translation.en: move into new markets.
What if I've been thinking about this all wrong?
translation.zh: 如果我一直以来的想法都错了呢？

translation.en: This could be exactly what the company needs.
translation.zh: 这也许正是公司所需要的

translation.en: Okay, you know what?
Enough.
Close your eyes.
Get some sleep.
Shit.
What is it?
Huh?
What is it?
Nothing. Just a meeting. Go back to sleep now.
translation.zh: 没什么 就是开个会 你继续睡吧

translation.en: So they found a buyer? That's got to be it. It's pretty obvious.
translation.zh: 他们找到买家了？ 肯定是 很明显

translation.en: Which means a bunch of us are about to lose our jobs.
translation.zh: 也就是说我们中有很多人要失业了

translation.en: We don't know that. Let's not panic, all right?
translation.zh: 现在还不好说 不要恐慌 好吗？

translation.en: I'm weeks away from hitting my five years.
translation.zh: 我还差几周就做满五年了

translation.en: -If they cut me now, I am screwed. -[sniffing]
translation.zh: 如果他们现在解雇我 我就完蛋了

translation.en: [scoffs] If they cut me now,
I'm pretty much homeless.
That's me.
Look, let's just calm down, keep an open mind. All right?
translation.zh: 听着 我们冷静下来保持开放的心态 好吗？

translation.en: You never know. This could be a good thing.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢 这可能是件好事

translation.en: [Melusi on video] Recently, our company was dying.
translation.zh: 最近 我们的公司奄奄一息 （终点迫近）

translation.en: -A heavy darkness had befallen us. -[inspirational music playing]
But then a new leader was chosen.
translation.zh: 但一位新的领袖被选中

translation.en: -And a bright new day dawned for AMI. -[inspirational music builds]
A man not afraid to think outside the box,
translation.zh: 一个不怕打破常规的男人

translation.en: to do away with wasteful things,
to make AMI stronger, safer, more efficient.
translation.zh: 让AMI变得更强、更安全、更高效

translation.en: A man who even changed time!
translation.zh: 一个甚至改变了时间的男人！

translation.en: -[eagle screeches] -And why has he done all these things?
Because he cares about the future.
And that future starts today!
Yes, yes, yes.
When I became your leader,
I could see that there was a lot of doubt in your eyes.
translation.zh: 我能看到你们的眼里有很多怀疑

translation.en: You were thinking, "Can this young bull really provide for our future?"
translation.zh: 你们在想：“这只牛犊能带领我们走向未来吗？”

translation.en: Well, I have an answer for you today.
translation.zh: 今天 我给你们答案

translation.en: All the way from overseas!
translation.zh: 这个答案来自遥远的海外！

translation.en: -Your new leaders of AMI! -[dance music resumes]
Yes! Yes!
-[loud pop] -Yeah!
[man] Howdy!
Come talk to your people. Talk to your people.
translation.zh: 来跟你的员工聊聊 跟大家说两句

translation.en: [with Australian accent] Well, hello, AMI.
Yeah, hello.
I can't tell you how excited we all are
translation.zh: 我无法告诉你们我们有多兴奋

translation.en: to finally see you all in the flesh!
translation.zh: 终于见到了活生生的你们！

translation.en: Yeah! The fleshy flesh!
Now, before we go any further,
I want to make one thing very clear.
And that is that we are not planning on making any major changes.
translation.zh: 我们不打算做任何重大改变

translation.en: No job cuts. No demotions.
translation.zh: 没有裁员 没有降级

translation.en: No downsizing of any sort.
translation.zh: 没有任何形式的削减工资

translation.en: You can all rest easy.
Can I get a bloody "Hallelujah?"
translation.zh: 大家能给我一句“哈利路亚”吗？

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yes!
We will worry about all of that shit next month!
translation.zh: 我们下个月再担心这些事！

translation.en: That's it. I'm homeless.
translation.zh: 完了 我要无家可归了

translation.en: So now, as you know,
Melusi is going to be stepping out, and I'm going to be stepping in.
translation.zh: 梅鲁西要卸任了 我将接替他的位置

translation.en: Badrick over here is going to be my second-in-command.
translation.zh: 巴德里克会是我的副手

translation.en: And the beautiful Anya will be our new Change Manager.
translation.zh: 美丽的安雅会成为我们新的改革经理

translation.en: Even though, like I've just said, you've got nothing to worry about at all.
translation.zh: 即便如此 就像我刚刚说的你们没什么好担心的

translation.en: For now.
Now, this is usually the time, I suppose, when your new leader,
translation.zh: 好了 通常在这个时候 你们的新老板

translation.en: your new chief,
bores you to death with his galaxy of achievements.
translation.zh: 会用他的丰功伟绩把你们无聊死

translation.en: But instead I'm going to open the floor to my lovely colleagues
translation.zh: 但我会把舞台让给我可爱的同事们

translation.en: to have a word with you beautiful people.
translation.zh: 和你们这些可爱的员工好好聊一聊

translation.en: I think Badrick, you first.
translation.zh: 巴德里克 你先来吧

translation.en: Uh, spoiler warning,
he's a bit intense.
[with Jamaican accent] There are three things you need to know about me.
translation.zh: 关于我 你们需要知道三件事

translation.en: One, I don't take shit from nobody!
And two, you romp wid mi,
and I'm gonna mash you up!
Three, no matter what…
I always come out on top.
And if you leave me stranded on Jamrock with no food…
translation.zh: 如果把我丢到牙买加 没有食物…

translation.en: everything irie.
Because Badrick will feast on himself.
translation.zh: 因为巴德里克会吃自己的肉

translation.en: I'm sorry. Did he just say he'd eat himself?
translation.zh: 不好意思他刚才是说他会吃自己吗？

translation.en: [man] Thank you, Baddy!
Yeah, Badrick, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 巴德里克 女士们先生们

translation.en: But he has a heart of gold.
translation.zh: 但他有一颗金子般的心

translation.en: Yeah, he can light up the darkest room.
translation.zh: 对 他可以照亮最黑暗的房间

translation.en: No, really. Yeah. All right, thanks, Baddy.
translation.zh: 真的 好了 谢谢 巴巴

translation.en: Next up we have the lovely Anya.
[with Russian accent] So. What is change?
Put your hand down.
Is change when we birth
small uterus, slimy lizard
translation.zh: 小小的子宫 黏糊糊的蜥蜴

translation.en: into baby?
Who knows?
Because change is very mysterious. Hmm?
translation.zh: 因为改变很神秘 对吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
Anya, thank you so much. You really raise a valid point there.
translation.zh: 安雅 非常感谢 你确实提出了一个很好的观点

translation.en: Change, guys, is so… mysterious.
translation.zh: 伙计们 改变非常…神秘

translation.en: All right, that's it. Let's all get back to work.
translation.zh: 好了 就这样吧 大家回去工作吧

translation.en: We need more of that Zulcanoid.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多的祖卡诺德

translation.en: That's a bloody order!
Just playing, silly buggers!
Oh, yeah. Gotcha.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. But seriously, let's go. Come on.
translation.zh: 但说真的 走吧 快点

translation.en: Yeah! Let's go!
-Yeah. Yeah. -[Anya] Bye-bye.
[boss] There's some jelly in the canteen. Come on.
-[man laughing] -What the hell was that?
Still think this is a good idea?
translation.zh: 你还觉得这是好主意吗？

translation.en: [Sam] However bad we thought it was going to be,
translation.zh: 不管我们以为有多糟糕

translation.en: we were wrong.
Way wrong.
-Hey. -Hey.
Based on some budgetary challenges,
we will no longer be issuing you with any weapons.
translation.zh: 我们不再给你们分发任何武器

translation.en: Instead, we will provide you with something far more valuable.
translation.zh: 相反 我们会提供更有价值的东西

translation.en: The ability to fight off intruders
by only using your instincts,
your training,
and some basic office supplies.
translation.zh: 和一些基本的办公用品

translation.en: So our special guest today is Sensei Storm Force.
translation.zh: 我们今天的特别嘉宾是风暴老师

translation.en: The inventor of the world's most mixed martial art,
translation.zh: 世界上最复杂的混合武术的发明者

translation.en: KMKJ.
Or rather "Krav Maga Karate Jujutsu.".
translation.zh: 全称是“以色列格斗术空手道柔术”

translation.en: Sensei.
Krav Maga Karate Jujutsu is all about flow.
translation.zh: “以色列格斗术空手道柔术”的核心是能量的流动

translation.en: About using the tools around you to shift energy.
translation.zh: 是利用你们手边的工具来转移能量

translation.en: And to attack!
Now… is this a stapler or…
jaws of death?
I'm pretty sure that's just a stapler.
translation.zh: 我很确信那只是个订书机

translation.en: Yeah, it's a stapler. Ah, this guy.
translation.zh: 是啊 就是个订书机 这家伙

translation.en: We don't need Krav Maga Jujutsu Karate.
translation.zh: 我们不需要“以色列格斗术空手道柔术”

translation.en: Just be awake. And focus. Foo!
translation.zh: 只要保持机警 集中精力就行

translation.en: Shut it!
Reading is not really my thing.
-Just give it to me straight. -[Colleen] Well, he's always late.
translation.zh: 有什么话就说吧 他总是迟到

translation.en: He lies all the time. He has a terrible attitude.
translation.zh: 他总是撒谎 他的态度很糟糕

translation.en: Basically, he's the worst staff member we've ever had.
translation.zh: 简单来说他是我们见过的最差的员工

translation.en: So if him that bad, why him still here?
translation.zh: 如果他那么差劲为什么他还在这里？

translation.en: Why you don't get rid of him?
I wish we could. Believe me.
translation.zh: 我也希望我们可以 相信我

translation.en: But his father is one of our biggest clients,
translation.zh: 但他父亲是我们最大的客户之一

translation.en: and I really don't want to rock that boat.
So what you want to do?
I mean… I could work him over.
translation.zh: 我是说…我可以教训他一下

translation.en: Break a few bones.
Slice off some skin.
You… you can do that?
Yeah, man.
That is very tempting, but…
But I actually had a slightly different idea.
translation.zh: 我其实有个稍微不同的想法

translation.en: Hmm. Okay. Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 嗯 好 说来听听

translation.en: Well, I thought that we could, uh… move him.
translation.zh: 我想我们可以把他…弄走

translation.en: You know? Give him the kind of soul-crushing job
translation.zh: 明白吗？给他一份令人身心俱疲的工作

translation.en: that just completely destroys him. You know?
translation.zh: 彻底地摧毁他 你知道吗？

translation.en: Make his days just slow, painful, psychological torture.
translation.zh: 把他的生活变成缓慢、痛苦的精神折磨

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah, man.
Do what you want. Me don't give a shit.
Whoa! Me give a shit!
I give a shit!
Also, you were joking about the slicing thing, right?
translation.zh: 另外 你说要切我的肉是说笑吧？

translation.en: And just to clarify,
what did you mean about torture?
translation.zh: 你说的折磨是什么意思？

translation.en: -Where is he? -I'm sorry, what?
Gregory. Where's Gregory?
translation.zh: 格雷戈里 格雷戈里在哪？

translation.en: -Right over here. -Right over there.
Hello, mate.
You can't cancel the medical aid.
People rely on that. I rely on that!
translation.zh: 大家都指望这个呢 我指望这个！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Steady there, sailor. Batten that hatch.
translation.zh: 哇 别激动 水手 闭嘴

translation.en: Okay, so now, it's, uh…
Wait a minute, don't tell me.
Sam.
Sam! Sammy! Yeah, Sammy. Okay.
So, let's start that over,
but maybe this time, without the death stare. Okay?
translation.zh: 但或许这次 不要死亡凝视 好吗？

translation.en: So, what's the big emergency?
translation.zh: 那么 什么事这么紧急？

translation.en: My daughter is on some very expensive medication
translation.zh: 我女儿在吃一种很贵的药

translation.en: that I can't afford without the medical aid. Okay?
translation.zh: 没有医疗补助 我负担不起 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh… -Gotcha! Okay. Yeah.
All right. But I'm afraid we don't really have a choice.
It was a part of our agreement with your former leader. So…
translation.zh: 这是我们和你前老板达成的协议的一部分 所以…

translation.en: So… change the deal.
Well, now wait a minute. Wait a bloody minute.
Oh, I've just been reading up on natural therapies.
translation.zh: 我读到了很多自然疗法的文章

translation.en: Yeah? And did you know it is incredible
translation.zh: 只要将一些植物煮一煮

translation.en: what you can make just by boiling a few plants together.
translation.zh: 就能有神奇的治病疗效

translation.en: Did you know that? It is crazy!
translation.zh: 你知道吗？太不可思议了！

translation.en: And, you want to know something else?
translation.zh: 而且 你知道最绝的是什么吗？

translation.en: You can probably find everything that you need in your own forest.
translation.zh: 所有你需要的东西都可以在森林里找到

translation.en: [laughs] Oh yeah!
Now I'd say that's a win.
translation.zh: 要我说 问题解决了

translation.en: No. No, no, no!
These are sophisticated drugs! Okay?
translation.zh: 这是复杂的药品 好吧？

translation.en: You can't just make them with fucking plants!
translation.zh: 你不能用该死的植物来制作！

translation.en: Boil.
You gotta boil them.
translation.zh: 你得把它们放在锅里煮

translation.en: Now, before I can teach you anything,
translation.zh: 在我教你们任何东西之前

translation.en: I need to know exactly what I am dealing with.
translation.zh: 我需要知道你们的资质如何

translation.en: Any volunteers?
Thank you. Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你 先生

translation.en: -What's your name? -Sorry, no. I wasn't volunteering.
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字？-不好意思 我没有自荐

translation.en: -He was being a dick. -[manager] His name's Junior.
And he will be volunteering. Won't he?
translation.zh: 他会当志愿者 对吗？

translation.en: Yes. Lovely.
[Storm Force] Come on. Don't be shy. Please come forward.
translation.zh: 来吧 别害羞 请上前来

translation.en: Oh, Prince, Prince, Princey Prince, Prince.
This is long overdue.
You realize it's all your fault?
translation.zh: 你知道这都是你的错吧？

translation.en: What is this?
That is a schedule, Einstein.
translation.zh: 这是日程安排 爱因斯坦

translation.en: Yeah, but for what?
translation.zh: 是啊 但是什么日程？

translation.en: For the toilet.
Since you love them so much,
translation.zh: 既然你这么喜欢蹲厕所

translation.en: you are going to be timing people.
translation.zh: 你要负责给所有人计时

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry? Timing people in the toilet?
translation.zh: 不好意思？计时上厕所的时间？

translation.en: Exactly.
Do you have any idea how much productivity is lost
when people go for a loo break?
Please. Please. I'm begging. Don't do this.
translation.zh: 拜托了 我求求你 别这样

translation.en: I'm sorry? Are you too good for this job?
translation.zh: 什么意思？你看不上这份工作吗？

translation.en: No! No, no, no, it's not that. It's just that, um…
translation.zh: 不是！不是那样的 只是…

translation.en: I'm still part of the Finance department, right?
translation.zh: 我还是财务部的员工 对吗？

translation.en: No, of course not!
Now you're part of Facilities,
translation.zh: 现在你是设施部的一员

translation.en: but your time sheets still come to me, so do not fuck them up!
translation.zh: 但你的计时表格仍然归我管所以不要搞砸了！

translation.en: Okay, look. I don't care. I'll do the job.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 我不在乎 我接受这工作

translation.en: If you take me out of the Finance department, I will…
translation.zh: 如果你让我离开财务部 我会…

translation.en: I will lose my entire trust fund.
translation.zh: 我会失去我全部的信托基金

translation.en: What?
Yeah.
-Your entire trust fund? -All of it!
I had no idea.
Yeah, it's pretty stupid if you ask me.
translation.zh: 是啊 要我说 这真是太蠢了

translation.en: Your entire trust fund? That's amazing.
translation.zh: 你全部的信托基金？太棒了

translation.en: You made my day.
Oh, shit.
So… do I stay here?
[Anya] Do not be stressed.
I think you are experiencing some change. So why don't you sit down,
translation.zh: 我想你正在经历一些改变所以不如你坐下来

translation.en: and we can talk about how you feel? Okay?
translation.zh: 我们可以聊聊你的感受？好吗？

translation.en: How I feel? Is she being--
Are you being for real, right now?
We are talking about my daughter's life here!
translation.zh: 我们谈论的是我女儿的生命！

translation.en: Yeah, we know because you already told us.
translation.zh: 是的 我们知道因为你已经告诉我们了

translation.en: [laughing] You bloody bugger! He's trying to fool us!
translation.zh: 你这个傻瓜！他想耍我们！

translation.en: All right. [scoffs]
Clearly, you guys think that this is some kind of joke, huh?
translation.zh: 显然你们觉得这是个笑话 对吧？

translation.en: This is funny?
Well, see if this is funny, okay?
How about I see you in court?
translation.zh: 我们在法庭上见怎么样？

translation.en: -Court? -Yeah.
I don't like the sound of that at all.
[sighs] I'll tell you what.
How about we don't see you at all anymore?
translation.zh: 不如我们再也别见了 怎么样？

translation.en: Because you're fired.
Now that felt bloody amazing!
You see, sudden change, like explosion in the action movie.
translation.zh: 你瞧 突如其来的改变就像动作片里的爆炸

translation.en: Would you shut the fuck up about change? Just--
translation.zh: 你能不能别再提什么改变了？就…

translation.en: You know what?
This isn't over.
[Gregory] That's the spirit, Sammy! This isn't over!
translation.zh: 就是要有这种精神 萨米！这事没完！

translation.en: Yeah!
Now, I thought Sammy was a girl's name?
translation.zh: 我以为萨米是女孩的名字？

translation.en: You may pick anything.
[Junior] Uh, okay.
It's mightier than the sword.
No. It definitely isn't.
Do you know what a sword is, sir?
translation.zh: 你知道剑是什么吗 先生？

translation.en: Of course I know what a sword is.
It's okay. It's okay, dumb-dumb.
I've trained squirrel to sniff out landmines.
translation.zh: 我训练过松鼠探测地雷

translation.en: You can do this.
Now, shall we begin?
Uh, sorry. Um…
Sorry, what are the goggles for?
translation.zh: 抱歉 护目镜是干什么用的？

translation.en: Focus. Focus!
One day this could be a life or death situation.
translation.zh: 有一天 这可能是攸关生死的时刻

translation.en: Now I need you to think of your weapon
translation.zh: 现在我需要你想想你的武器

translation.en: and how you can use it to protect yourself.
translation.zh: 以及你要如何使用它保护自己

translation.en: To protect myself from what?
translation.zh: 保护自己不受什么伤害？

translation.en: From this!
Whoa! Whoa!
Wait! Okay? Uh… Maybe someone else can volunteer instead?
translation.zh: 等等！好吧？也许其他人可以做志愿者？

translation.en: No, relax. Relax.
It's only a simulation. You'll hardly feel a thing.
translation.zh: 这是模拟 你不会有什么感觉

translation.en: That's not true. Come on!
Ah! Stop!
[Storm Force] Protect yourself!
Use your other senses! You don't need your eyes.
translation.zh: 用你的其他感官！你不需要眼睛

translation.en: What the fuck, man? It's just a pen!
translation.zh: 搞什么 伙计？这就是一支钢笔！

translation.en: It's not just a pen!
-It's whatever you need it to be! -[Junior] Shit!
You're such an embarrassment.
I'm cutting your hours to three shifts a week.
translation.zh: 我要把你的工作时间减少到每周三班

translation.en: Sean?
Hey, Prince.
Wow, that's a really nice watch.
Can I touch it?
You know what?
Actually, I'm the only one authorized to handle it.
translation.zh: 其实 我是唯一得到授权负责此事的人

translation.en: And it's not a watch.
Then what is it?
-It's a stop watch. -Isn't that a watch?
For fuck's sake! Please just go to your desk.
translation.zh: 该死的！请回到你的工位去

translation.en: Okay.
Fucking knobface!
I'm not going to wait in, um…
Okay, Patrick. On your marks.
translation.zh: 好的 帕特里克 各就各位

translation.en: Get set. And… go.
Unbelievable.
Playing around with people's lives? Thinking that's a joke?
translation.zh: 拿别人的生命开玩笑？你觉得很好笑吗？

translation.en: You think that's a joke? Think…
We'll see. We'll see.
Damn it.
Hey, you.
[Rosemary] Hey, baby. How's your day going?
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝 今天过得怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, you know. Pretty normal.
translation.zh: 你知道的 一切如常

translation.en: Are you in your car?
Yeah. Yeah, I, um… I finished early.
translation.zh: 是啊 我…我提早下班了

translation.en: Thought I'd surprise you.
[Rosemary] Oh, that's nice.
Would you mind stopping at the pharmacy?
Lebo's almost out of tablets.
Is she? Um…
Yeah. Yeah, um…
No problem. I'll…
I'll see you soon.
[Rosemary] Okay. Love you.
Love you too.
Fuck!
Fuck.
You shouldn't have done that. What if Zepler casts a frozen spell?
translation.zh: （等我解决了这个老家伙下个就轮到你！） 不该那么做的如果齐普勒施放冰封咒怎么办？

translation.en: He can't. I picked up Grindol's shield, remember?
translation.zh: 他不能我捡到了格林多的盾牌 记得吗？

translation.en: Just try to keep up.
[man] That's right. Sorry. Sorry.
-[woman] As long as you've got my back. -[man] Don't you worry about that.
translation.zh: 只要你掩护我 就没问题 别担心

translation.en: Where'd you guys get money to buy a new video game?
translation.zh: 你们哪来的钱买新游戏机？

translation.en: Hey, guys?
Where's the fridge?
[woman] Shh! Quiet! Please!
-[glass shatters] -Hey!
Please tell me you didn't sell the fridge to buy a fucking video game!
translation.zh: 别告诉我你们把冰箱卖了买了这个该死的游戏机！

translation.en: Dude, language!
We don't go around swearing about your job.
translation.zh: 我们不会骂骂咧咧地指责你的工作

translation.en: We would never do that.
Dressing up like idiots and playing video games
translation.zh: 打扮成傻瓜玩电子游戏

translation.en: isn't a fucking job!
You're both such losers!
I believe that our honor has been challenged.
translation.zh: 我相信我们的荣誉受到了挑战

translation.en: I believe it has.
-You know what that means, my love? -What's it mean, babe?
translation.zh: -你知道那代表什么吗 亲爱的？-代表什么 宝贝？

translation.en: It means I'm going to smite him with yonder broadsword!
translation.zh: 代表我要用大砍刀削他！

translation.en: Let's… Let's calm down.
Just put the sword down, Harry. Please.
translation.zh: 把剑放下 哈利 拜托

translation.en: You will have to pry it from my cold, dead fingers.
translation.zh: 你只能从我死去的冰冷的手指间把剑撬开

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -Arm yourself.
-[woman chuckles] -Now battle is joined.
Oh, shit! [grunts]
[Harry] Come back here!
To the halls of Valhalla!
-Come hither! -[Junior] Harry, stop. Stop. Please!
translation.zh: -放马过来吧！-哈利 住手 拜托！

translation.en: -Harry, please! -Chop off his head!
[Junior] No, stop! Harry!
[Prince] I'm telling you, the whole place has gone mad.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 整个公司都疯了！

translation.en: I mean, who times people when they're taking a shit?
translation.zh: 谁会在别人拉屎的时候给人家计时？

translation.en: What if they're constipated?
You can't do that to people.
This can't be legal.
Know what? We need to contact our lawyer.
translation.zh: 我们需要联系我们的律师

translation.en: Get him on the phone--
There's always someone to blame, isn't there?
translation.zh: 永远都是别人的错 是吧？

translation.en: What?
Didn't you hear anything I just said?
The deal was five years,
and yet again you've fallen short.
That is not fair.
I never quit. I stuck it out.
translation.zh: 我从没放弃过 我一直在坚持

translation.en: You never put in the work. It was a joke to you!
translation.zh: 但心思没放在工作上你认为这是个笑话！

translation.en: What did you think was gonna happen?
Come on, Dad. Don't do this to me.
translation.zh: 拜托 爸爸 别这样对我

translation.en: Wake up, boy. You did it to yourself.
translation.zh: 醒醒 小子 这是你自找的

translation.en: Okay, you know what? I don't have to put up with this.
translation.zh: 好吧 你知道吗？我不必忍受这一切

translation.en: Well, you could always leave.
I mean, you're only what? Twenty-seven?
Fine. You want me gone? No problem.
translation.zh: 好吧 你想让我离开？没问题

translation.en: Where're you going to go?
I don't know, Dad!
You know what? I don't care.
I will stay in my car if I have to.
translation.zh: 如果有必要 我会住在车里

translation.en: Anywhere is better than this place. You know that?
translation.zh: 哪都比这里强 你知道吗？

translation.en: Stupid chairs!
Hey, Chen. It's me. Um…
I was wondering if you're still interested in Zulcanoid?
translation.zh: 我在想你是否还对祖卡诺德有兴趣？

translation.en: Um, because if you are,
I think I might be able to make it happen.
So, yeah. Let me know, okay?
translation.zh: 所以 给我回个电话 好吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, Chen. Um…
When I said let me know, I didn't mean like right now.
translation.zh: 我说让你回电话 不是指现在

translation.en: I didn't want you to change your mind.
How soon can you get it?
I don't know. A couple of weeks, maybe.
translation.zh: 我不知道 大概几周吧

translation.en: You need to hurry. I'm running outta time.
translation.zh: 你得快点 我没时间了

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Chen, look.
I really need to know what you're going to use it for.
translation.zh: 我真的需要知道你要用它做什么

translation.en: Like, for real.
I already told you.
It's for children to help with their medical equipment for the heart disease.
translation.zh: 为了制造医疗设备帮助心脏病患儿的

translation.en: Uh, I thought you said cancer?
It's for both, okay? Look, Sam…
translation.zh: 两种病都治 好吗？听着 萨姆…

translation.en: It's Zulcanoid. Not uranium.
translation.zh: 这是祖卡诺德 不是铀

translation.en: I'm not building a bomb, okay?
translation.zh: 我不是要制造炸弹 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Okay. Fine. Okay.
Good. Now let's talk money.
translation.zh: 很好 我们来谈谈价钱吧

translation.en: So we can bring all the girls to your yard for some fucky-fucky. Huh?
translation.zh: 好让所有女孩对你投怀送抱嘿咻嘿咻

translation.en: [Junior] You don't know what it's like.
translation.zh: 你们不知道那是什么感觉

translation.en: Living with them is like a recurring nightmare.
translation.zh: 跟他们一起生活就像是不断重复的噩梦

translation.en: In your apartment? Must be nice having walls.
translation.zh: 在你的公寓里？有墙一定很好吧

translation.en: You know what isn't nice?
Getting beaten up by a pathetic man-child
translation.zh: 被一个可悲的长不大的巨婴暴打

translation.en: and having to beg for my life.
But have you wasted every single day for the past five years,
translation.zh: 但你有浪费了过去五年时间

translation.en: and now you're completely screwed?
-Oh, your trust fund? -Oh, dude. Please. No.
translation.zh: -你的信托基金？-伙计 拜托 别

translation.en: I don't think I have one of those. I'll check with my PA.
translation.zh: 我好像没有信托基金我问问我的助理

translation.en: -[Prince] You don't. -Linda? [Sam] All right. Enough.
translation.zh: -别这样 好吧 够了-琳达？

translation.en: Okay? Everybody's having a shit time. All right?
We get it.
Whining about it isn't going to change anything.
translation.zh: 抱怨解决不了任何问题！

translation.en: Then what do you suggest?
Oh, do you really want to know?
I'm living in my car. So yeah, I would like to know.
translation.zh: 我现在住在我的车里所以 是的 我想知道

translation.en: Okay. What's the one thing we all need?
translation.zh: 好 我们都需要什么？

translation.en: That'll make all our problems go away?
translation.zh: 能解决我们所有问题的东西？

translation.en: I don't know. A shitload of money?
translation.zh: 我不知道 一大笔钱？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Exactly.
And I think…
I think I know how to make that happen.
translation.zh: 我想我知道怎么弄到钱

translation.en: What? How?
By taking something that doesn't belong to us.
translation.zh: 通过拿走不属于我们的东西

translation.en: Come on, Sam. You've never even had a parking ticket.
translation.zh: 拜托 萨姆 你连停车罚单都没有

translation.en: And now you want to what? Rob a bank?
translation.zh: 现在你想做什么？抢劫银行？

translation.en: No, not rob a bank! Besides, it wouldn't even be stealing.
translation.zh: 不 不是抢银行！再说了 这根本不算是偷东西

translation.en: It would be taking back something that we've earned.
translation.zh: 我们只是拿回我们应得的东西

translation.en: Something that we've dedicated our lives to.
translation.zh: 我们为之奉献一生的东西

translation.en: [Prince] Okay.
What are you talking about?
I got an offer for 12 units of Zulcanoid.
translation.zh: 有人出钱跟我买12瓶祖卡诺德

translation.en: -And it's a lot of money. -How much?
Two million.
What? From who?
It doesn't matter. Just, all you need to know is that he's legit,
translation.zh: 这不重要 你们只需要知道他是合法用途

translation.en: and he's prepared to pay half upfront.
For a dozen units? That's it?
That's it.
Prince.
You know what? I don't care anymore.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我已经不在乎了

translation.en: It's the least we deserve, the way they've treated us.
translation.zh: 他们那么对待我们这是我们起码应得的

translation.en: Come on, guys.
I've lived my whole life going by the rules.
translation.zh: 我这一辈子都遵纪守法

translation.en: Right?
Sure, what's that gotten me, but…
translation.zh: 结果换来了什么 但是…

translation.en: Okay, well, if they want to play dirty… so can we, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 既然他们想玩阴的…那我们也行 对吗？

translation.en: Yes.
Let's do it. Let's do it.
Okay, dude. Keep it down.
translation.zh: 好吧 伙计 小声一点

translation.en: -We're doing it. It's done. -I'm sorry. My God.
translation.zh: -我们干这一票 就这么定了-对不起 我的天

translation.en: Just one thing, though.
We're not criminals.
So we're going to need some help figuring this out.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要一些帮助

translation.en: Why are you looking at him like that?
Fine! Fine. I know a guy.
translation.zh: 好吧 我认识一个人

translation.en: Like, a felon?
[Prince] Am I the only one who thinks this is a really bad idea?
translation.zh: 只有我认为这是个坏主意吗？

translation.en: Just calm down, okay?
They're mostly just regular people with issues.
translation.zh: 他们大部分都是有点心理问题的普通人

translation.en: No big deal.
Regular people? Hmm?
With some issues?
Look, I know he's your dad,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道他是你爸爸

translation.en: but I don't think we should be taking advice from a crazy person.
translation.zh: 但我不认为我们应该听一个疯子的建议

translation.en: He's not crazy. His lawyer got him in here, okay?
translation.zh: 他不是疯子他是被他的律师害的 好吗？

translation.en: -It was either this place or jail. -Okay.
translation.zh: -当时要么来这里 要么坐牢-好吧

translation.en: But he knows what he's talking about.
translation.zh: 但他知道自己在说什么

translation.en: And he's no snitch.
Do not speak to anyone you don't know. Keep your voice down at all times.
translation.zh: 不要跟不认识的人说话全程都放低音量

translation.en: No sudden movement. No whistling. No singing. No dancing.
translation.zh: 不能突然移动 不许吹口哨不许唱歌 不许跳舞

translation.en: And do not accept any offers of food.
Oh. No singing? Such a pity.
translation.zh: 哦 不许唱歌？真可惜

translation.en: Sorry. Um, question.
Have any of your guests ever been attacked in your experience?
translation.zh: 你们的访客有没有被攻击过？

translation.en: They only attack the weak.
I'm sorry? What?
-Is he joking or…? -[Sam] Come on. Just go.
translation.zh: -他在开玩笑还是…-来吧 走吧

translation.en: [Junior] There he is.
Come on.
I want to take out your eyes and eat them!
translation.zh: 我要把你的眼睛挖出来吃掉！

translation.en: Take out your brain and eat it!
translation.zh: 把你的脑子挖出来吃掉！

translation.en: You want to come here? Come here, man! I'll show you something.
translation.zh: 你想来这里吗？过来 伙计！我给你看样东西

translation.en: Ah, you want some?
Come. Want some of this?
Hey, Dad.
Junior!
-Hey, Dad. -What a lovely surprise!
Come here, son.
How're you doing? You doing alright, Dad?
translation.zh: 你怎么样？你还好吗 爸爸？

translation.en: No, I'm fine.
I'm keeping my head down. Keeping out of trouble.
translation.zh: 保持低调 不惹麻烦

translation.en: That's great.
And who are these?
These are my friends. This is Prince and Sam.
translation.zh: 这些是我的朋友这是普林斯和萨姆

translation.en: -Prince! -Hello.
-Come here, young man. -Oh, okay.
Your hair smells… smells wonderful. What is it?
translation.zh: 你的头发闻起来…好香 是什么味道？

translation.en: Fear mostly.
Funny! I like him.
Yes. And, um, he's…
Sam. You're the smart one, aren't you?
translation.zh: 萨姆 你是聪明的那个 对吧？

translation.en: The leader of the pack.
I can tell these things.
I'm not really a leader. Just, we're all friends.
translation.zh: 我不是什么领袖 我们都是朋友

translation.en: Friends? Wonderful. Well, anyway. Let's sit down, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 朋友？太好了 好吧我们坐下吧 先生们

translation.en: I assume this isn't a social call?
translation.zh: 我猜你们不是来看望我的？

translation.en: I'm guessing that you young boys need something from me.
translation.zh: 我想你们这些孩子需要我的帮助

translation.en: We were hoping you could give us some advice.
translation.zh: 我们希望你能给我们一些建议

translation.en: We need to get our hands on something that
doesn't completely belong to us.
translation.zh: 不完全属于我们的东西

translation.en: -Hello! -Oh my God!
You want to pat my dog?
Oh, um… Thank you. But, uh, no, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 但是不用了谢谢

translation.en: He doesn't bite. I promise.
He's a good boy. You're a good boy!
translation.zh: 它是个乖狗狗 你是个乖狗狗！

translation.en: Yeah, it's not that.
I am just deathly allergic to dogs.
This is Fingers.
And he's not gonna go anywhere unless you pat the dog.
translation.zh: 除非你拍那只狗 不然他不会走的

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm not doing that. -Pat the dog.
translation.zh: -好吧 我不会那么做-拍狗

translation.en: -No. -Pat the dog.
-No! -Just pat the damn dog!
All right, fine!
What is his name?
Little Bit.
Little Bit? Um, okay. "Little Bit" of what?
translation.zh: 一小点？好吧 “一小点”什么？

translation.en: Mucus.
-[Prince] Oh my God. -That means snot.
-[Sam] Don't let go, Prince. -Guys, it's wet!
translation.zh: -别放手 普林斯-各位 狗是湿的！

translation.en: [Senior] We can carry on.
Fingers here blew his brains with crystal meth.
translation.zh: 手指吸冰毒把脑子吸坏了

translation.en: He won't remember a single thing. So, please.
translation.zh: 他什么都不会记得 所以请说吧

translation.en: Okay. Um…
If we were trying to lift something from, like, a warehouse,
translation.zh: 如果我们想从仓库里偷点东西

translation.en: how would we go about that?
Well, what you'd always need to know.
translation.zh: 你永远都需要铭记的准则

translation.en: The Five Ds.
Define. Delegate. Divert. Disguise.
translation.zh: 计划 分工 转移 伪装

translation.en: And the most important one of them all,
do not get fucking caught.
That's it?
Yeah, pretty much.
Don't stop patting him!
-Okay. -He's almost asleep.
Yeah, I'm so sorry. Um… Sure, sure. Um…
translation.zh: 是的 我很抱歉 好的…

translation.en: Question. Hypothetically, what if we work at the place we're trying to hit?
translation.zh: 我有个问题 假设我们想打劫的地方就是我们工作的地方呢？

translation.en: Is that, like, a red flag or is it like--
Oh, no. Not necessarily.
No. You see, um, say for example,
if you left your fingerprints or a sample of hair or whatever.
translation.zh: 如果你们留下了指纹或头发样本之类的

translation.en: They can't hold you to it.
Simply because, well, it's like a… a free fuck-up.
translation.zh: 因为 这就像是免死金牌

translation.en: Right. Free fuck-up.
Mr. Moses, please, don't take this the wrong way, but
translation.zh: 摩西先生 请不要误会 但…

translation.en: you're good at this sort of thing, right?
translation.zh: 你很擅长这种事 对吗？

translation.en: You tell me.
Wowzers! He is-- You are so good, sir!
translation.zh: 天啊！他…你太棒了 先生！

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -[Sam] Seriously?
-What? -I'm so sorry.
You guys smell that?
Did one of you fart?
Oh, he's done it again.
[Fingers] It's my special pudding.
-Oh my God. -I made it myself. You should try some.
translation.zh: -我的天-我自己做的 你尝尝看

translation.en: -Oh my God! -It's delicious. It gives you superpowers.
translation.zh: 很好吃 它能给你超能力

translation.en: Hey, Doc.
Thanks.
Focus.
Sorry! Uh, sorry. Are you okay?
I'm fine.
-Are you sure? -I'm good. I promise.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？-我很好 我保证

translation.en: -Okay. -So? Where's the fire?
-The fire? Where, uh… What? -You look like you're in a rush.
translation.zh: -着火？哪里…什么？-你看起来很着急

translation.en: I… Sorry. I just need to go start my shift.
translation.zh: 我…抱歉 轮到我的班了

translation.en: Are you all right? You look a little nervous.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？你看起来有点紧张

translation.en: Nervous?
That's strange. I feel fine. [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: 真奇怪 我感觉很好 对

translation.en: Oh, um, that's, um… That's a pity.
I thought… maybe I made you nervous?
translation.zh: 我以为…也许是我让你紧张了？

translation.en: Actually… yes, you do.
I was just trying not to make you feel bad about it. Uh…
translation.zh: 我只是不想让你觉得难堪

translation.en: But, um… you know what might help?
translation.zh: 但…你知道什么或许有帮助吗？

translation.en: -What's that? -Well…
Maybe we could, you know,
spend some more time together.
That way I wouldn't feel so nervous around you.
translation.zh: 这样我看到你就不会那么紧张了

translation.en: -If you think it might help? -I think it might.
translation.zh: -如果你觉得有帮助的话？-可能吧

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
-I'll send you a text. -Perfect.
-Great. -Great.
Right. Great. Ah.
I've got to get going.
Got to go punch my cock.
Punch the clock! Punch the clock. Uh,,,
Sorry! Excuse me.
Uh… Okay, bye.
-Bye. -Bye.
Sorry.
All right, guys. So?
translation.zh: 好了 各位 怎么样？

translation.en: When are we doing this?
I vote Saturday night. It's the perfect time.
translation.zh: 我建议周六晚上 那个时间最完美

translation.en: -Why? -It's the big game.
-Everybody's gonna be in the office. -What about patrols?
translation.zh: -所有人都会在办公室里-那巡逻队呢？

translation.en: They only need to tag in every three hours.
translation.zh: 他们只需要每三小时巡视一遍

translation.en: So we'll be good. Trust me.
translation.zh: 我们不会有事的 相信我

translation.en: You know what would help? If we got them drunk.
translation.zh: 你知道什么有帮助吗？把他们灌醉

translation.en: Yes, but how?
We could send them a shitload of beers. Right?
translation.zh: 我们可以给他们送很多啤酒 对吧？

translation.en: And a note from management thanking them for all their hard work.
translation.zh: 加一个管理层写的卡片感谢他们的辛勤工作

translation.en: Telling them to enjoy the game. Right?
translation.zh: 让他们好好享受比赛 对吧？

translation.en: That could actually work.
But not everybody's going to get drunk.
translation.zh: 但不是每个人都会喝醉

translation.en: Okay. Sure.
-We put tranquilizers in the beer! -What?
translation.zh: -我们在啤酒里加镇定剂-什么？

translation.en: No! No, absolutely not. I don't want anybody getting hurt.
translation.zh: 不！绝对不行我不想让任何人受伤

translation.en: Oh, no. No one's gonna get hurt.
We used to drug my grandmother all the time. It's perfectly safe.
translation.zh: 我们以前经常给我奶奶下药非常安全

translation.en: What? You drugged your granny?
Oh, dude, don't start with me, okay?
translation.zh: 老兄 别跟我提这个话茬 好吗？

translation.en: You don't know the shit we went through.
translation.zh: 你不知道我们经历了什么

translation.en: You know she used to shave our heads while we were sleeping?
translation.zh: 你知道她曾经趁我们睡觉时把我们的头发都剃光吗？

translation.en: -You want to know why? -Why?
I don't know. I'm still asking myself.
translation.zh: 我不知道我到现在依然在问自己这个问题

translation.en: So it'll work.
They'll be fine. They'll be sleeping like kittens. Guys, I swear.
translation.zh: 他们不会有事的他们会睡得跟猪一样沉 各位 我保证

translation.en: Okay, we can keep it in mind. But so long as it's safe.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们先记下 但只要安全就行

translation.en: It will be.
-All right, so… -Cool.
Saturday it is.
-Saturday! -[Sam] Perfect.
If one of us get caught, no snitching.
translation.zh: 如果我们中有人被抓了？不准告密

translation.en: A spit oath? Um, I'm not shaking that.
translation.zh: 吐口水发誓？我不会握你的手

translation.en: Come on, man! We need to commit!
translation.zh: 拜托 伙计！我们需要承诺！

translation.en: Yeah. No, thanks, man. I'm good.
translation.zh: 是啊 不了 谢谢 不用带上我

translation.en: Yeah. We really don't need an oath.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们不需要发誓

translation.en: You know? We trust each other. Right?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我们互相信任 对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Yeah?
Fine, okay. I just thought that we were having a moment.
translation.zh: 好吧 我以为刚才情绪到位了

translation.en: No, there was no-- We were not having any moments. Idiot.
translation.zh: 好吧 我以为刚才情绪到位了 不 没有 没有那回事 白痴

translation.en: To getting what we deserve.
To what we deserve.
Hear! Hear!
[Junior on voicemail] Hey Portia. I was wondering if maybe you'd like to have dinner next week?
translation.zh: 嗨 波西娅 我在想也许下周可以一起吃个晚餐？

translation.en: I'm even willing to pay half.
That's a joke. Of course. Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 开个玩笑 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Okay.
You planning on running into any ninjas today?
translation.zh: 你计划今天遇到忍者吗？

translation.en: Look, I would rather just have it than not have it.
translation.zh: 听着 我宁愿带着 有备无患

translation.en: Why you always got to give me shit?
-Because you're being ridiculous. -I am not.
-I am being prepared. -Mm-hmm.
Anyway, what did you bring? Where's your weapon?
translation.zh: 话说回来 你带了什么？你的武器呢？

translation.en: I'm gonna get some air.
All right, you know what? Kill me for being a little nervous.
translation.zh: 好吧 我确实有点紧张 杀了我好了

translation.en: Shit is about to go down!
How can you be so calm?
[Sam] I'm not. I'm just focused on the plan.
translation.zh: 我没有 我只是专注于计划

translation.en: Which, in case you've forgotten, does not include any sword play.
translation.zh: 以防你忘了我们的计划里没有舞刀弄枪

translation.en: [Prince] Oh God. What's he carrying?
I have no idea.
Hey, guys. We good?
translation.zh: 嘿 各位 一切顺利吗？

translation.en: That really depends on what's in the giant bag.
translation.zh: 那取决于你那个大袋子里装的什么

translation.en: The masks. Remember?
You need a giant bag for three masks?
translation.zh: 三个面具需要这么大的袋子吗？

translation.en: Yes. If you're doing it right. Check it out.
translation.zh: 是的 如果你要做对的话 看看

translation.en: What the hell's that?
What? What's wrong with it?
Nothing. I just didn't realize we were entering a children's TV show.
translation.zh: 没有 我只是不知道我们要参加儿童电视节目

translation.en: Normal masks aren't good enough! Okay?
translation.zh: 普通的面具不够好！好吧？

translation.en: We need to cover our whole heads!
Just try it on.
Is there only chicken masks?
No.
Oh, great. Yeah, I will just take one of the other ones. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好极了 我选其他的 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, fine. Whatever.
All right, what do we have? Oh motherf--
translation.zh: 好吧 这是什么？我的妈呀…

translation.en: -What? -A fucking unicorn! Seriously?
translation.zh: -什么？-他妈的独角兽！你是认真的吗？

translation.en: -What? -Why couldn't you get us cool shit?
translation.zh: -怎么了？-你为什么不能给我们弄点酷的？

translation.en: Like dead presidents? Right?
This is the cool shit. Okay? Just trust me.
translation.zh: 这就很酷 好吗？相信我

translation.en: You know what? Just give them to me.
The masks are fine.
Could the two of you please focus?
translation.zh: 你们两个能不能专心点？

translation.en: If we screw this up, it's prison.
translation.zh: 如果我们搞砸了 就得坐牢

translation.en: Remember that.
Yes, of course. Incarceration. I…
translation.zh: 是的 当然 监禁 我…

translation.en: My head's in the game.
I'm ready. Let's go.
Yeah, I'm even more ready than that.
translation.zh: 是的 我比他准备得更好

translation.en: Oh God, I did it again. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 我又来了 对不起

translation.en: [Sam] Move.
-Shotgun. -Oh, Junior!
Seriously? You never heard of ski-masks? They're in every heist film you ever seen.
translation.zh: 说真的 你没听说过滑雪面具吗？ 它们在每部抢劫电影里都出现过

translation.en: Know what your problem is? You're ungrateful.
translation.zh: 你知道你的问题是什么吗？你不知感恩

translation.en: -[Sam] Mm. -No wonder your dad doesn't like you.
Guys, it worked! They're all knocked out.
translation.zh: 各位 药起效了！他们都被放倒了

translation.en: Okay, good. Good.
What about the cameras? You manage to turn them off?
Yeah. Hard drive's in my bag.
I told you it would work.
One shouldn't throw the word "genius" around, but…
translation.zh: 虽说一个人不该总把“天才”挂在嘴边 但是…

translation.en: Yeah, let's not get ahead of ourselves, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧 我们别太得意忘形了 好吗？

translation.en: How's it looking up there?
Like a ghost town.
Okay. Uh, I'm on my way.
Oh, this is such a tragedy.
Now, I'm not normally one to point fingers.
translation.zh: 我通常不喜欢指责别人

translation.en: But I'm fairly sure I told you not to eat the humans.
translation.zh: 但我很确定我告诉过你不要吃人类

translation.en: -Why would you think it was me? -Because it's always you!
translation.zh: -你为什么觉得是我？-因为每次都是你！

translation.en: Every time we get on a planet,
translation.zh: 每次我们登陆一个星球

translation.en: it's the same bloody story.
The locals slide down your neck!
translation.zh: 你把当地人吞进肚子里！

translation.en: It's disgusting!
You know what? Maybe it was him!
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？也许是他干的！

translation.en: No, no. No, no. No. It wasn't him
because he has food allergies, and you know it.
translation.zh: 因为他对食物过敏 你知道的

translation.en: Well, I wonder what that could be.
translation.zh: 我很好奇那是什么声音

translation.en: I don't know. I don't have mind-reading protocol.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我没有读心功能

translation.en: You've got a problem!
And Control's going to hear about it.
I've got eyes on the ridiculous unicorn.
translation.zh: 我看到了可笑的独角兽

translation.en: He's heading in.
Why a unicorn?
[Portia] Who are you?
Why are you doing this?
Okay, so it's not really who we are that's important.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们是谁并不重要

translation.en: It's what we are.
translation.zh: 重要的是 我们是什么

translation.en: You see…
we're aliens.
From outer space.
Just like in your movies.
translation.zh: 就像你们电影里演的那样

translation.en: You know? Movies?
This is where we get our accents from.
translation.zh: 我们的口音就是从里面学的

translation.en: So I choose a Russian spy with sexy protocol.
translation.zh: 我选择了一个性感俄罗斯间谍的身份

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] Yeah, man. And I choose the best of all. A Rastafarian from Jamaica.
translation.zh: 对 我选了最好的那个来自牙买加的拉斯塔法里信徒

translation.en: [in English] And I'm a fusion of the two greatest humans that ever lived,
translation.zh: 我融合了史上最伟大的两个人类

translation.en: Mahatma Gandhi and Kylie Minogue.
[Gregory] You are?
Hey. How's it going in there?
translation.zh: 嘿 里面情况怎么样？

translation.en: He's covered by ten feet of concrete. He can't hear you from here.
translation.zh: 他被3米厚的水泥阻隔他听不到你说话

translation.en: Right. Yeah, yeah, yeah. My bad.
Over and out.
[Badrick] All right, baby. I'll tell you a story.
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝 我给你讲个故事

translation.en: But I think for you, it will be a nightmare.
translation.zh: 但我觉得对你来说这会是一场噩梦

translation.en: Because this here scary.
What you call Zulcanoid came here on a meteor
translation.zh: 你们所谓的“祖卡诺德”来自一颗流星

translation.en: when our moon exploded.
translation.zh: 是我们的卫星爆炸时产生的

translation.en: Our job is to find it.
translation.zh: 我们的工作就是找到它

translation.en: Not only does it regenerate the skin,
it repairs our bodies,
gives us energy.
Basically, it keeps us alive.
translation.zh: 简单来说 它是我们的生命之源

translation.en: [Anya] You see?
It make me like new woman.
In a few days we are going to take all the Zulcanoid.
translation.zh: 再过几天 我们会带走所有祖卡诺德

translation.en: That is not good news for you and your friends.
translation.zh: 这对你和你的朋友来说不是好消息

translation.en: Because it's fire upon Babylon!
translation.zh: 因为那会是火烧巴比伦！

translation.en: We're gon' burn up everything!
Nothing personal, you understand?
translation.zh: 不是针对谁 明白吗？

translation.en: Just protocol.
[Junior] Sam! Start the car.
Our new bosses are in the vault and they're not human!
translation.zh: 我们的新老板在保险库里而且他们不是人类！

translation.en: -Hey! Uh-huh. Horses aren't allowed here. -No. Shh. I'm not a horse. It's a mask.
translation.zh: -喂！这里不允许马进来-不 我不是马 这是面具

translation.en: -No! You need to go home. -Get away!
Run! Run!
-Come on. Come on! -[engine sputtering]
[Junior] Go, go, go, go, go!
Come on! Go, go, go!
-[Prince] Go, go, go, go, go! -[engine sputtering]
-All right! -[Junior] Get us the fuck out of here!
-I'm trying! -Come on!
Oh my God!
What? What now?
I think that was a limb!
-[Sam] What? -It flew across the window!
How about a snack?
translation.zh: 我们来吃点零食怎么样？

translation.en: What the fuck is going on?
Where'd they come from? Why did their skin glow?
translation.zh: 他们从哪里来的？为什么他们的皮肤会发光？

translation.en: No! No. This can't be happening! [laughs]
-Junior! Hey! Junior! -This is not happening.
translation.zh: -朱尼尔！喂！朱尼尔！-这不是真的

translation.en: What? What? What?
Junior, I need you to focus, okay?
translation.zh: 朱尼尔 我需要你专心 好吗？

translation.en: -I need you to focus. -Okay. Focus.
Tell me what happened. Okay?
translation.zh: 告诉我发生了什么 好吗？

translation.en: What happened in the vault?
translation.zh: 保险库里发生了什么事？

translation.en: What happened in the vault? They, uh… they had someone tied up.
translation.zh: 保险库里发生了什么事？他们…他们把人绑起来了

translation.en: Um, they said that they needed Zulcanoid for their bodies.
translation.zh: 他们说他们的身体需要祖卡诺德

translation.en: It heals their skin or some shit. Um…
translation.zh: 能让他们的皮肤愈合之类的狗屁

translation.en: What? What's going on?
They're going to…
They're gonna steal the Zulcanoid, and then they're gonna burn everyone.
translation.zh: 他们要偷走祖卡诺德然后烧死所有人

translation.en: That's it. That's their plan.
translation.zh: 就是这样 这就是他们的计划

translation.en: Burn… Who? Who's going to burn?
-Who's burning? -The aliens!
That's who's gonna burn everyone. The aliens!
translation.zh: 他们要烧死所有人 外星人！

translation.en: Oh, God. I need something to breathe in.
translation.zh: 天啊 我快喘不上气了

translation.en: Is there like a plastic bag or some shit?
Oh God…
Sam. Sam, what are we going to do?
translation.zh: 萨姆 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: I don't know.
I need a minute to think. Okay?
translation.zh: 我需要点时间思考 好吗？

translation.en: People are getting dismembered while you think!
translation.zh: 你在思考的时候 人们正在被肢解！

translation.en: Oh my God! There is no need to be so overdramatic!
Overdramatic? It's fucking aliens, Sam!
translation.zh: 夸张？那他妈是外星人 萨姆！

translation.en: They're going to fucking eat your intestines and do "whooo-ooh!"
translation.zh: 他们会吃掉你的肠子还会发出“呜呜”的声音

translation.en: What the hell is "whoo-ooh!"?
It's the alien sound! That's the sound they play for aliens!
translation.zh: 是外星人的声音！外星人出场就是这个配乐！

translation.en: Fuck!
[Prince's father] You're weak. Just like your mother.
translation.zh: 你很软弱 跟你妈妈一样

translation.en: [Colleen] He's always late. He lies all the time.
translation.zh: 他总是迟到 他总是撒谎

translation.en: [father] You don't have the stomach…
[Colleen] Basically, he's the worst staff member we've ever had.
translation.zh: 简单来说他是我们见过的最差的员工

translation.en: [father] It was a joke to you. What'd you think was gonna happen?
translation.zh: 对你来说是个笑话你觉得会发生什么？

translation.en: [Colleen] Clean that or I'll give you another warning.
translation.zh: 清理干净 不然我再给你一次警告

translation.en: [father] Coward.
-[Prince] We need to stop. -Say what now?
translation.zh: 我们得停车 你说什么？

translation.en: We need to pull over.
Oh, I am not pulling over right now.
Now! Pull over now! I am being serious!
Okay.
My dad was right.
I've been a coward my whole life.
And I'm sick of it.
If we keep going, I will never change.
translation.zh: 如果我们继续开下去我永远不会改变

translation.en: Yeah, I will never.
translation.zh: 对 我永远不会改变

translation.en: We need to go back.
Oh, we need to go back!
He's right.
These are our people. We drugged them.
translation.zh: 那些是我们的同事我们给他们下了药

translation.en: We did that.
We can't leave them behind.
No. No.
We can't. They're our people.
translation.zh: 我们不能 他们是我们的同事

translation.en: We go back.
We're going back.
We go fucking back.
How's everyone feeling?
We're going to need some weapons.
You mean like this?
Not so ridiculous now, is it?
translation.zh: 现在不觉得可笑了 对吧？

translation.en: Oh, nunchucks. Nice.
translation.zh: 哦 双节棍 很好

translation.en: Did it come with a Bruce Lee poster?
translation.zh: 是不是附赠李小龙的海报？

translation.en: Yeah, it did, actually.
Is that a problem?
No, not at all.
As long as they don't break while fighting an alien,
translation.zh: 只要在打外星人时不会折断

translation.en: then everything's all good.
If I were you, I'd be more worried about my table ornament.
translation.zh: 如果我是你我会更担心我的餐桌装饰

translation.en: Table ornament?
Dude, I'll have you know that this was crafted by a master swordsmith
translation.zh: 哥们 我告诉你 这是由大阪的铸剑大师打造的

translation.en: in Osaka.
translation.zh: 这是由大阪的铸剑大师打造的

translation.en: So it's basically unbreakable.
translation.zh: 所以基本上是坚不可摧的

translation.en: Guys. Hey.
Sorry. Sorry.
Wait.
We don't let them get away. We fight to the death.
translation.zh: 我们不能让他们得逞我们要战斗到最后一刻

translation.en: Why do you keep spitting on yourself?
translation.zh: 你为什么老是往身上吐口水？

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
Come on, man! This is a real moment.
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计！这是重大时刻

translation.en: We're probably gonna die here.
We are not going to die. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们不会死的 好吗？

translation.en: How do you know?
I just know.
Now come on. Let's go get these assholes.
translation.zh: 走吧 我们去干掉那些混蛋

translation.en: Last thing, that is disgusting.
translation.zh: 最后一件事 这太恶心了

translation.en: Also, a spit oath is not a real thing.
translation.zh: 而且根本没有吐口水宣誓这回事

translation.en: -It is a real thing. -Yeah. If you're, like, eight.
translation.zh: -有的-对 如果你是8岁的话

translation.en: -Wait. Wait! -What?
The vault door.
What about it?
-Their lives depend on Zulcanoid, right? -Right.
translation.zh: -他们的生命依赖祖卡诺德 对吧？-对

translation.en: So why would they leave the vault door open?
translation.zh: 那他们为什么要打开保险库门？

translation.en: It's a trap.
Oh, shit.
[Badrick] Wagwan!
Oh, shit. They look really happy to see us.
translation.zh: 该死 他们看到我们很开心

translation.en: That is a terrible sign.
This is it.
I'll take the office.
I'll take the vault.
-Good luck. -You too.
Whoa. Whoa! You guys are leaving me with him?
translation.zh: 等等！你们要留我对付他吗？

translation.en: There's three of them, there's three of us.
translation.zh: 他们三个人 我们三个人

translation.en: You have a sword. He doesn't.
You'll be fine.
Dude, you can take him.
translation.zh: 老兄 你可以打败他

translation.en: Definitely.
Okay. I can… I can take him.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以打败他

translation.en: Looks like it's just you and me, Princey.
translation.zh: 看来就剩咱俩了 普林斯

translation.en: This is going to be so much fun.
Just the two of us dancing through the night.
translation.zh: 只剩我们俩在夜晚跳舞

translation.en: Dancing and fighting. The two things I can't do. Fuck!
translation.zh: 跳舞和打架这两件事我都不擅长 该死！

translation.en: What you have there?
It's a… It's a samurai sword.
Yeah, it's from Osaka, so it's really legit.
translation.zh: 对 是从大阪来的 所以是货真价实的

translation.en: Princey have a sword. Princey have a sword!
What you gon' do with it? Chop off me head?
translation.zh: 你打算用它做什么？砍掉我的头？

translation.en: Um. I was maybe thinking about it. But--
translation.zh: 那个 我是这么考虑的 但是…

translation.en: There's only one problem, man.
You brought a sword to a gunfight.
translation.zh: 你带了一把剑来参加枪战

translation.en: Let me show you what I have.
translation.zh: 我让你看看我有什么装备

translation.en: Holy shit!
Oh, Princey!
Oh my fucking shit!
So what? We're hiding now?
I could've sworn he was right here.
translation.zh: 我发誓他刚才就在这里

translation.en: Hello, mate.
I believe you humans call it teleportation.
translation.zh: 我相信你们人类称之为瞬移

translation.en: I knew you'd come back. You're a feisty one.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会回来 你很强

translation.en: But it's a big mistake.
Yeah, well, you know what? The way I see it…
translation.zh: 是啊 你知道吗？在我看来…

translation.en: it's only a big mistake… if I don't kick your ass.
translation.zh: 这确实是个天大的错误…如果我不踢爆你的屁股的话

translation.en: Well, Sammy, that's your first problem.
translation.zh: 萨米 这就是你的第一个问题

translation.en: I don't have an ass.
My name is not Sammy!
Portia! What're you doing here?
I was looking for you.
What?
It doesn't matter! Listen… we're under attack.
translation.zh: 这不重要！听着 我们被袭击了

translation.en: I know how this is gonna sound, our new owners are aliens.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很扯但我们的新老板是外星人

translation.en: And they're trying to kill everyone!
Calm down. It's okay.
What do you mean?
Death is just a part of change.
translation.zh: 死亡只是改变的一部分

translation.en: [Russian accent] Nothing to be worried about.
Surprise!
Oh God.
I tell you what.
I'll let you take a free swing.
Give it all you've got.
See if you can reach mi neck.
translation.zh: 看看你能不能砍到我的脖子

translation.en: God, you're hard to look at.
Or we could just keep talking?
translation.zh: 或者我们可以继续聊天？

translation.en: I think there's a lot we could learn from each other.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们可以从对方身上学到很多

translation.en: So, what's your planet like?
I'm sure it's so lovely.
It's a free hit, man!
translation.zh: 我都让你随便打了 伙计！

translation.en: Do it while you still can!
Okay, Prince. You can do this.
translation.zh: 好吧 普林斯 你可以的

translation.en: Come on, man! Don't be a pussy!
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计！别跟个胆小鬼似的

translation.en: [Gregory] Sammy!
Sammy! Did you know that humans can actually fly?
translation.zh: 萨米！你知道人类会飞吗？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh yeah!
If you wanted to,
you could cut through the air like a bloody gazelle.
translation.zh: 你可以像该死的瞪羚一样飞过天空

translation.en: There's only one small hiccup.
The landing.
Ooh, crikey!
-[coughs] -[Gregory] That's got to hurt.
Pathetic.
How much body percent fat are you anyway, huh?
translation.zh: 你的体脂率到底有多少？

translation.en: I really do hope that you're not too hairy.
You humans are so soft.
translation.zh: 你们这些人类太软嫩了

translation.en: Like little jellyfish.
That's why you're so tasty.
I just make clowning with you!
I don't have the pain receptors. So…
translation.zh: 我没有痛觉感受器 所以…

translation.en: You know?
But you do.
[Prince] Oh my God!
That was probably an ornament.
Fuck!
-[Gregory] Come on, mate. -Ah, shit.
Wake up.
Where you gonna go?
In case you haven't noticed, I can go anywhere I want!
translation.zh: 以防你没有注意到我可以随意变换位置！

translation.en: -[Gregory laughs] -Fuck!
Okay. Here's a clue.
Shit.
[Gregory] The more intelligent the life-form, the less physical matter.
translation.zh: 生命体越有智慧 实体就越少

translation.en: I'm 92% gas, mate.
translation.zh: 我身上92%都是气体 伙计

translation.en: Mainly hydrogen and a lovely little bit of butane.
translation.zh: 主要是氢 和一点丁烷

translation.en: So that's why throwing things at me…
translation.zh: 所以不管你向我扔什么

translation.en: …is not gonna help you.
You know what? You're right.
Well, halle-bloody-lujah! He's finally getting it! [laughs]
translation.zh: 哈利路亚！他终于明白了！

translation.en: But there's something you should know.
Oh, yeah? What's that, mate?
I'm a goddamn geologist.
Which makes me an expert in gas, asshole.
translation.zh: 所以我是气体的专家 混蛋

translation.en: Any last wishes, Princey?
translation.zh: 还有什么遗愿吗 普林斯？

translation.en: Yes, actually.
If you're gonna kill me,
I'm not dying on my knees.
No problem, mon.
But you close your eyes.
This is going to hurt.
I don't care.
I'm not closing my eyes.
Even though I really want to.
Aren't you the brave one?
Suit yourself.
Oh my shit! Oh my shit!
Hey, man!
Good timing.
Like, really good timing!
Yeah, you okay?
Yeah, I… [exhales]
I think so.
I did ruin my pants, though. But…
translation.zh: 我的确尿了裤子 但是…

translation.en: Better my pants than my face, right?
translation.zh: 裤子没了总比头没了强 对吧？

translation.en: Good to know.
-Let's go. We've got to find Junior. -Um…
translation.zh: 走吧 我们得去找朱尼尔

translation.en: Maybe he's already at the car. You know what?
translation.zh: 也许他已经在车上了 这样吧

translation.en: -I'll go check. -Prince. Let's go.
Okay. Oh God.
You want to know what they call me back on my planet?
translation.zh: 你想知道在我的星球上他们都叫我什么吗？

translation.en: Something like… "The Devourer." Huh?
Do you want to see why?
Yes?
Oh shit!
Get away from him, you monster!
No! Portia, no! Run!
Thank you.
No problem.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm fine.
-You sure? -What about you?
-Your leg? -I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
translation.zh: -你的腿？-我没事 别担心我

translation.en: It's nothing. I can barely feel it.
translation.zh: 没什么 我几乎感觉不到

translation.en: How'd you know?
Found out they were made of gas.
So I took a chance.
Uh, good call.
Hey. So you took him out? The big guy?
translation.zh: 嘿 所以你把他干掉了？那个大块头？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I slapped him around a bit,
translation.zh: 对 我扇了他几巴掌

translation.en: and then sliced his head off. Just like…
translation.zh: 然后把他的头砍了下来 就像…

translation.en: So Sam saved you too?
Yeah, 100 percent.
Right.
Is that a pen in your leg?
Yeah.
Oh my God, dude. We need to take it out, like, right now.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 老兄我们得马上把它取出来

translation.en: What? No?
You could get ink poisoning. It's fatal.
translation.zh: 你可能会墨水中毒的 这是致命的

translation.en: Ink poisoning isn't a thing.
Oh, dude. It's really a thing.
Sorry.
-Just let me-- -Whoa! Wait!
What if it's in an artery? Huh?
I could bleed to death.
There's a small chance of that.
But there's hardly any major arteries in your legs.
translation.zh: 人腿上几乎没有大动脉

translation.en: That's not true.
Okay, trust me! I have a medical degree, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 相信我！我有医学学位 好吗？

translation.en: You studied for three months online, Prince. You don't know shit!
translation.zh: 你在网上学了三个月 普林斯你懂个屁！

translation.en: Okay, that's just semantics.
translation.zh: 好吧 那只是个语意概念罢了

translation.en: -I think… Just let-- -[Junior] Can you stop?
-Please. Just-- -Just be brave!
Here you go.
-Ah… -Now, can we please get out of here? Okay?
translation.zh: 我们能离开这里吗？好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Of course.
You can put your-- Okay.
What did she do to you?
I don't know. I mean, I just blacked out.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我晕过去了

translation.en: All I remember is I was cleaning outside of her office--
translation.zh: 我只记得 我在清理她办公室外面…

translation.en: Whoa! Okay, Portia! Guys, wait!
translation.zh: 慢点！好的 波西娅 各位 等等！

translation.en: Take it easy.
Is she okay?
I just need to catch my breath.
Breathe in through your nose and out through your mouth.
translation.zh: 用鼻子吸气 用嘴巴呼气

translation.en: Wow. All this time I thought it was "breathe out, then in."
translation.zh: 哇 一直以来我都以为是“先呼再吸”

translation.en: -What? -Oh, shit.
What a night.
I'm still trying to process everything. You know?
translation.zh: 我还在努力消化这整件事你知道吗？

translation.en: [Prince] Tell me about it.
I'm gonna need years of therapy after this.
translation.zh: 这件事过后我需要看好几年的心理医生

translation.en: I mean, those were real aliens, you know?
translation.zh: 那些可是真正的外星人

translation.en: We didn't imagine that.
Hey, man. Um…
-Don't move. -What?
No! Don't move.
What is it?
It's probably nothing.
Prince! Dude, what is it?
translation.zh: 普林斯！老兄 怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Okay. I can fix this!
Wait, I'm going to be a paramedic.
translation.zh: 等等 我要当医护人员

translation.en: I can fix this.
I can do this.
-Prince. Give me the leg. -No.
-Give me the leg. Let go! -No! I can't let go!
translation.zh: -把腿给我 放手！-不！我不能放手！

translation.en: -No! He needs it. -Let go!
Legs are important! Okay?
He doesn't need his legs because he's dead!
translation.zh: 他不需要他的腿 因为他死了！

translation.en: Gone! Okay?
I'm sorry, but there's nothing you can do for him now!
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但你现在帮不了他！

translation.en: No! [grunts]
It doesn't matter, okay? All I need is a first-aid kit,
translation.zh: 没关系 好吗？我只需要一个急救箱

translation.en: a shitload of bandages.
I can do this. I can do this.
Bandages?
Dude, what're you talking about?
Are you crying?
No. No, not at all! I'm…
Whoa! I… I think I'm allergic to the aliens.
translation.zh: 哇！我好像对外星人过敏

translation.en: You had another one of those stupid visions?
translation.zh: 又出现了一个愚蠢的幻觉？

translation.en: No, I didn't have one of those stupid visions, okay? Shut up.
translation.zh: 不 我没出现愚蠢的幻觉 闭嘴

translation.en: -Can you walk? -Yeah, I can walk.
Yeah, I got you.
Thanks.
-You good? -Yeah.
You know what sucks?
translation.zh: 你知道最糟糕的是什么吗？

translation.en: We just saved everyone, and no one's gonna know.
translation.zh: 我们救了所有人 但没人会知道

translation.en: That's okay. We'll know.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们知道就行了

translation.en: Oh, please. Don't act like you don't care.
translation.zh: 求你了 别装得无所谓

translation.en: You're just trying to impress your girlfriend.
translation.zh: 你只是想在女朋友面前耍酷

translation.en: No, that's not it.
I'm not-- And she's not my girlfriend.
translation.zh: 我没有…而且 她不是我女朋友

translation.en: Are you?
You can be such an idiot sometimes, Junior.
I love you too.
Uh, I mean, I like you.
You like me too, so…
We like each other.
I love you.
I think my luck's changing!
What the fuck just happened?
Melusi.
He must've put paint in the Zulcanoid.
translation.zh: 他一定是在祖卡诺德里混了油漆

translation.en: Overheated in the car.
What were you saying about luck changing?
Sam? What're you doing?
Sam?
[Sam] Often the solutions to our problems are a lot closer than we think.
translation.zh: 通常我们解决问题的方法比我们想象中更唾手可得

translation.en: Sometimes they're right in front of us.
translation.zh: 有时候他们就在我们面前

translation.en: Oh my goodness! It works.
[Sam] Turns out the real value of Zulcanoid
translation.zh: 原来祖卡诺德的真正价值

translation.en: is what it can do for damaged skin.
And that changed everything.
Dude, I still can't believe that this is our place.
translation.zh: 伙计 我还是不敢相信这是我们的家

translation.en: [laughs] I mean, look at this view!
translation.zh: 我是说 看看这风景

translation.en: It's ridiculous.
It beats the shit out of my car, that's for sure.
translation.zh: 这比我的车强多了 这是肯定的

translation.en: You know I've never had a roommate before?
translation.zh: 你知道我从来没有过室友吗？

translation.en: It's gonna be a new journey for us, man.
translation.zh: 这对我们来说是新的旅程 伙计

translation.en: You don't meditate
in the mornings, like… naked?
translation.zh: 冥想吧…光着身子的那种？

translation.en: Anything like that, right?
I mean, I don't, but if that's something you want to try?
translation.zh: 我不会 但如果你想试试的话？

translation.en: No!
That's not what I meant.
Sorry. I just misread.
Never mind. Let's just pretend…
What did you even say?
-What? -[Portia] Um…
So I do most of my things naked.
translation.zh: 我大部分的工作都是裸体做

translation.en: Are you boys okay with that?
100% fine with that. Yeah.
Beers in the fridge.
Thank you.
-Don't do that. -Oh my God. She winked at me.
translation.zh: 别这样 她对我眨眼了

translation.en: -No, she didn't. -Dude.
I am a medical professional.
The human body means nothing to me.
translation.zh: 人体对我来说毫无意义

translation.en: That's not true.
I took an oath.
I don't believe you.
-I did. Yeah. -Prince!
That's… That's not funny. Wait. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 这不好笑 等等 别这样

translation.en: [Junior] AMI didn't just get a new lease on life,
they got a new leader.
Someone who we could all get behind.
translation.zh: 一个我们可以追随的人

translation.en: And he made sure that everyone got what they deserved.
translation.zh: 他确保每个人都能得到应得的

translation.en: They say you stole over 50 million.
translation.zh: 他们说你偷了五千多万

translation.en: Is it true?
That's a lie. I didn't steal anything.
translation.zh: 胡说 我什么都没偷

translation.en: [guard] Ha! Whatever you say, Chief.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说吧 老板

translation.en: Welcome to your new home.
Hey. You want to pat my dog?
translation.zh: 嘿 你想拍我的狗吗？

translation.en: [guard] You're lucky.
Fingers here makes a very special pudding.
It's a secret recipe. I'm busy making some right now.
translation.zh: 是独家秘方 我现在就在做一些

translation.en: Oh my God.
[Prince] Does anyone want to tell me what this creepy place is?
translation.zh: 有没有人想告诉我这个诡异的地方是什么？

translation.en: [Sam] It's our old refinery. We used to process Zulcanoid here.
translation.zh: 这是我们以前的炼油厂我们以前在这里加工诺卡祖德

translation.en: [Prince] Oh, how fascinating.
I was hoping to go on a work tour on a Saturday.
translation.zh: 我本来想在周六参观工地的

translation.en: [Junior] This isn't a work tour, okay?
translation.zh: 这不是参观工地 好吗？

translation.en: As the new head of security, I've been checking out all our sites.
translation.zh: 作为新的安全主管我一直在检查我们的场地

translation.en: And last night, I found something unbelievable.
translation.zh: 昨晚我发现了一件难以置信的东西

translation.en: And I mean unbelievable!
Why didn't you just take a video of this unbelievable thing
translation.zh: 你为什么不把那个难以置信的东西拍下来

translation.en: and send it to me?
No. This is something that you need to see for yourselves.
translation.zh: 不 这个东西你们需要亲自去看

translation.en: Okay?
-You guys ready? -[Prince] For what?
To be disappointed?
Ah! Probably how Portia feels.
translation.zh: 可能波西娅就是这个感觉

translation.en: Just shut up! Come on.
Tell me that isn't the dopest shit you've ever seen!
translation.zh: 告诉我那不是你们见过的最赞的东西！

translation.en: Oh my God.
Now we know how they got here.
translation.zh: 现在我们知道他们是怎么来的了

translation.en: And this isn't even the best part.
translation.zh: 这还不是最精彩的部分

translation.en: What do you mean?
Wait till you see what's inside.
translation.zh: 等你看到里面就知道了

translation.en: What's inside? What's inside? What's inside?
Oh, shit.
